name: Scrap Harvest
description:
The time has come to harvest this year's yield of signs, manhole covers and anything else made of metal that is not bolted down... fine, even bolted can be taken with these amazing wire cutters.

But coppers have decided to sabotage your honest work, so you probably should make sure not to be seen while you aquire your crop.

Also make sure your vehicle stays functional. You don't have the manpower to carry all that metal yourself.

Controls:

  • Q - Equip wire cutters
  • W - Equip crowbar
  • E - Unequip
  • Space - Use current tool
